book.synopsis: Using the dot-com crash as an object lesson in how not to manage your portfolio, here is the best-selling, gimmick-free, irreverent, vastly informative guide to navigating the turbulence of the market and managing investments with confidence
book.title_long: A Random Walk Down Wall Street, Fourth Edition 1985
